personal.name: Atul Maurya
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.subtitle: Freelance Developer
personal.summary: Passionate Full Stack Developer with 2+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Specialized in React, Next.js, and Node.js with expertise in B2B, B2C, Education platforms, and eCommerce solutions.

services.title: Full Stack Development
services.description: Complete web application development from frontend to backend with modern technologies.

services.title: eCommerce Solutions
services.description: Custom eCommerce platforms with payment integration and admin panels.

services.title: B2B/B2C Applications
services.description: Business applications tailored for B2B and B2C requirements.

services.title: Education Platforms
services.description: Learning management systems and educational web applications.

workProcess.title: Plan
workProcess.description: Understanding requirements, creating wireframes, and planning the architecture.

workProcess.title: Build
workProcess.description: Developing the application with clean code, best practices, and regular updates.

workProcess.title: Test
workProcess.description: Thorough testing across devices, browsers, and performance optimization.

workProcess.title: Deploy
workProcess.description: Deployment to production with monitoring, maintenance, and support.

testimonials.name: Rajesh Sharma
testimonials.content: Atul delivered an exceptional eCommerce platform that exceeded our expectations. His attention to detail and technical expertise is remarkable.

testimonials.name: Priya Patel
testimonials.content: The education platform Atul built for us has transformed how we deliver online courses. Highly recommended for any educational project.

testimonials.name: Amit Singh
testimonials.content: Professional, reliable, and delivers quality work on time. Atul's B2B solution streamlined our entire business process.
